skins.name: Default
skins.secIdle1Text: You know, I've got a little sister called Morris. She's just so fun to tease~
skins.secIdle2Text: Try to find out how many surprises I've got in store for you, Commander!
skins.secIdle3Text: Come on, let's play! Ahaha! Tickle tickle!
skins.secTouchText: Don't you find this hobby of yours a bit strange...?
skins.secSpecialTouchText: ... You'd better be ready when you're going to sleep tonight, Commander!

skins.name: Retrofit
skins.secIdle1Text: That thing when you think you've been pranked even though I haven't actually done anything is a prank of sorts, too~
skins.secIdle2Text: Hmm... You've gotten too used to my old bag of tricks, so it's time to come up with some new ones! ... Whoops, sorry~ First, I'll need to finish all this work~
skins.secIdle3Text: Hey, Commander~ Don't you agree Hammann's reaction when she got pranked was just hilarious?
skins.secTouchText: Ahahahahaha! That tickles! Stop it, Commander! Okay, I'm sorry! I'm sorry for pranking you! Ahahahahaha!
